TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ToEmbedderHandler(object o, ToEmbedderArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ToEmbedderHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ToEmbedderHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ToEmbedderHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ToEmbedderHandler is removed from the event.
